title: Revenge Of The Re-Recordings
description:
We are so happy to hear and breakdown the re-recordings that Taylor Swift has blessed us with.. but she put up a literal fight for her work and her rights to own it. What happened to cause this in the first place? Nick, Ana, Amy and Lacey recap everything that went down leading up to the re-release of Fearless: Taylor's Version.
